'''Remnants of the Secret Source''' is a [[Quest Domain]] for {{Quest|Beneath the Secret Source}}.

==Walkthrough==
# Proceed deeper into the "Remnants of the Secret Source"
# Defeat the enemies {{Enemy List|Geo Slime*2}}
#* A '''Common Chest''' unlocks after the fight.
# Proceed deeper into the "Remnants of the Secret Source"
#* Optional enemies in the lower area: {{Enemy List|Fatui Skirmisher - Anemoboxer Vanguard;Fatui Skirmisher - Cryogunner Legionnaire;Fatui Skirmisher - Pyroslinger Bracer}}
# Defeat the enemies {{Enemy List|Fatui Pyro Agent;Fatui Skirmisher - Anemoboxer Vanguard;Fatui Skirmisher - Cryogunner Legionnaire}}
#* An '''Exquisite Chest''' unlocks after the fight.
# Try to decipher the mystic arts behind the locked mechanism
# Rotate the device to complete the image and open the path {{Enemy List|Secret Source Automaton: Hunter-Seeker}}
#* After several failed attempts, a hint dialogue appears; selecting the option will open [[Captured Photos]]
#* An '''Exquisite Chest''' appears after solving the puzzle.
# Stop [[The Captain]] and [[Ororon]]
# Depart the "Remnants of the Secret Source"
#* Speak with the [[Lord of the Night]] (optional)

==Chests==
See Walkthrough above for the locations.
